community.name: The Creator's Hub
community.tagline: “A supportive space for late-bloomers to finally write & publish their book using simple AI tools & step-by-step guidance.”
community.hero_statement: A safe, supportive community for late-bloomers (40+) who want to finally start, and finish, their book using simple AI tools, structure, and encouragement.

owner.name: Wendy Williams
owner.bio: Hi there! I’m a practical-minded entrepreneur passionate about helping authors to secure their manuscripts for online sharing. I'm also an author.

value_stack.promise: A safe, supportive community for late-bloomers (40+) who want to finally start, and finish, their book using simple AI tools, structure, and encouragement.
experience: 📅 Weekly Live Trainings: Learn how to clarify, plan, write and shape your book with simple guided steps.
You’ll create your idea, title, promise, reader, chapter map & first page, with AI prompts and coaching.
✏️ Writing Prompts, Feedback & Wins Celebrate progress, get support, and stay motivated.
🤖 AI Tools for Non-Tech Authors: Simple, supportive AI walkthroughs for planning, writing and editing without overwhelm.
💛 A Kind, Encouraging Community: Because you don’t have to do this alone, or perfectly.
next_steps: Comment below with your book idea (or ideas!)
Tell us what you hope to achieve before 2026
Join the weekly training on Tuesdays
Mark your calendar for the December challenge

survey_questions.question: What kind of creator are you, author, coach, or content creator,  and what’s your current goal or project?
What’s one thing you’d love to create, publish, or share this year that The Creator’s Hub can help you with?
What’s your best email so we can send you free tools, training, and community updates from The Creator’s Hub?

ad_strategy.hero_summary: A safe, supportive community for late-bloomers (40+) who want to finally start, and finish, their book using simple AI tools, structure, and encouragement.
hooks: Late bloomers 40+ finish your book with guided AI support.
5-day Start & Shape Your Book Challenge kicks off soon.
Simple AI templates remove the tech overwhelm from writing.

angles.name: Late Bloomer Breakthrough
angles.message: Show how the community helps 40+ creators ship their book with accountability.

angles.name: Challenge Momentum
angles.message: Use countdown-themed ads to drive FOMO into the December challenge.

angles.name: AI Co-Author
angles.message: Highlight practical AI walkthroughs tailored for non-technical authors.

targeting: Age 40-65 aspiring authors, writing & creativity interests.
Lookalike audiences from engaged Skool members or email list.
calls_to_action: Comment below with your book idea (or ideas!)
Tell us what you hope to achieve before 2026
Join the weekly training on Tuesdays
